website_summaries.verdict: Though it's basic and not as speedy as costlier smartphones from Tracfone, it's worth considering if you want a value-priced phone with a larger screen.
pros: Has Android's Lollipop 5.1 operating system and a vivid 5-inch touchscreen
Owners brag about how easy it is to use and adjust the settings
cons: With a 1.1 GHz processor, it's not as fast as some other Tracfone smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Being able to actually answer my phone is great, except now I have realized all the calls ...
customer_reviews.text: My old Tracfone would drop every single call I received. Being able to actually answer my phone is great, except now I have realized all the calls I was getting were scammers and telemarketers. Maybe my old phone was trying to save me... It runs smooth and the internet woks great 98% of the time. I do always wish for more space though. I have a 32 g card in it but it still wants to put everything on the phone and it fills up fast and doesn't want to move it to the sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Sharra Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Decent Phone.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good step up for someone looking to upgrade. The battery life is not good. I don't use my phone that much and I still have to charge it every two to three days.
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the clock settings
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the clock settings. I wonder if someone can tell me how to have a good clock settings in my LG cell phone. My previous LG cell phone has a better and easily readable clock.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Paz

customer_reviews.title: Seriously flawed
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a perpetual problem. The phone shuts down and will not power back on. Multiple attempts to remove and replace the battery sometimes work, but sometimes we can not get it going for days. THis is very upsetting as it was a christmas present for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! My phone even survived a brief trip in ...
customer_reviews.text: 5" screen for a TracFone! FANTASTIC! My phone even survived a brief trip in the toilet!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Love my LG Cdma tracphones
customer_reviews.text: In my area cdma phones work great...has a nice 5inch screen...curved screen is cool...dropped it once and its fine. My last two phones have been LG...Optimus Dynamic and Rebel Lte....all have been good phones....in my opinion the Camera is not bad. U get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: gary irvin

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine a product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine a product. I'll someone else to go for it. I've been using without any issues. Just follow the manufacturer guidelines and instructions, and you all set & ready to do your things with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: goodthings2you

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Not much memory would buy one with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Not much memory would buy one with more!
customer_reviews.author: Macaroon

customer_reviews.title: so good!.
customer_reviews.text: Hi folks. This one is a little higher than what I had. Getting to know it. Will add later as I learn. So far, so good!.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone twice and for me, it's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this phone and TracFone service is reliable and very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: LIZZA

customer_reviews.title: Seller would not return full refund
customer_reviews.text: Would not work for me. Returned phone.seller would not return full price
customer_reviews.author: Dave Tasker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: could not get it to work in our zipcode so ?????
customer_reviews.author: zhillschez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad has great features will upgrade because of the LG Treasure
customer_reviews.author: Levi Baldwin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great for the price. Would be nice if it had more ram of memory. Delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: carl gilbert II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best phone I have every used. Works good for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I never had a cell phone before, I like it very much. At times it is smarter then me, I hope some day i will understand it.
customer_reviews.author: gary miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i hope this treasure will last longer than my other treasure phone
customer_reviews.author: squeeker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for my wife to use and keep up with her grand children.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Houser

customer_reviews.title: I'm thinking the QVC deal is better, phone is basically free
customer_reviews.text: This phone took two conversations with Tracfone to get it working and number and service transfered. Then I found out no time came bundled. The contacts and apps don't transfer. I'm thinking the QVC deal is better, phone is basically free. This phone is good but not great.
customer_reviews.author: cat on wheels

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone very much EXCEPT that it does not have as strong a signal (4G Lite) as my last phone (also a TracFone LG) at my house. I was very disappointed that even though both phones were listed as 4G Lte the reception is so different.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best Tracfone I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have come to think of Tracfones as disposables, but this is much superior to any that I have owned before, including other LG, Motorola and Samsung. It is larger, has better resolution and sound, and even a decent manual.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chaikin

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for husband who has had Tracfones for years. He uses it at church for scriptures and music. He also calls me from the store now and then. BUT, this is a great phone, at a good price, with little irrirations. It's camera suffices but is nothing special. And, it only has just enough me memory. It's not for games oor television watching. But it still is worth 4 stars and Tracfone service is good!
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for ~6 months & it's held up well (I do have a case & screen protector though). The screen size is nice for a phone in this price range. Camera is ok. Probably want to have a better one if you're serious about pics. I don't care for the power & volume buttons being on the back of the device, but that seems to be LG's thing. There's also no indicator light if you've received a call/text/email. To me, that's the biggest annoyance. Would still purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: TracFone scores again! Why put out wads of money ...
customer_reviews.text: TracFone scores again! Why put out wads of money for a monthly plan, when this phone does all you need?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hyland

customer_reviews.title: had it sinse 2017 still using it.
customer_reviews.text: love the phone and it works great love it love it I don't want to ever replace this one it has been a great phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great photo's. Use the Wi-Fi option to cut down ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a major improvement over my prior LG phone. Large 5" screen, great photo's. Use the Wi-Fi option to cut down on the data bill.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Mamak

customer_reviews.title: Really nice phone. Holds a charge
customer_reviews.text: Really nice phone. Holds a charge, easy to adjust all the settings and works great. Love it! Great choice and good size.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Had no clue it would not work in Killeen Texas. Sent to son as gift, I even bought a "sim conversion kit" , to no avail!! Wasted my freakn money! Having my son send it to me & will see if I can return to Amazon for a credit or refund, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Willis J.

customer_reviews.title: OK I guess
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work in my area code (Alaska) so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Michael Baish

customer_reviews.title: Does work with Safelink! Just give them a call! Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does work with Safelink! Just give them a call to set it up! Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Met all our expectations at a great price. Being a TracFone allowed us to transfer ...
customer_reviews.text: Met all our expectations at a great price. Being a TracFone allowed us to transfer to our existing Net10 without any problem
customer_reviews.author: W Bokhoven

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying the phone. I love the size. It has all the features i wanted and is just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Winn

customer_reviews.title: He is finally learning how to use a smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother, he loves it. He is finally learning how to use a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Nice size screen
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning how to use it. Although it is not hard, its my first droid smart phone and has a larger easy to read screen..
customer_reviews.author: linda b.

customer_reviews.title: There is a large learning curve but I am learning ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a large learning curve but I am learning more every day
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tank

customer_reviews.title: Tracfone LG Treasure smart phone
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to set up and navigate love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: TraPhone unreliable company
customer_reviews.text: After two months it quit working, telling me the sims card need to be replaced. Try to contact TracFone to no avail, they put you on hold, checking your account, after holding 10 minutes they hang up. Would not recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable phone
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good phone for the price, not much to say. If you go into developers options and drop your background process's to 4 (don't go lower than 4 just to be safe) this bad boy should be able to play Pokemon Go pretty well despite being a 1GB ram phone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not Just an Entry Level Phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Battery life is at least ten days. I don't keep every function (location, internet, bluetooth, etc.) turned on when all I want is a phone. So it is perfect for the light, selective use I put it to. Being CDMA it runs on the Verizon network. This has always been the superior choice in the areas where I use it. I can't imagine what would make it better as a phone that would be worth any extra dollars. The screen is large enough for me and the resolution is perfectly adequate - actually quite sharp and bright.
customer_reviews.author: JWG

product_meta.title: TracFone LG Treasure 4G LTE CDMA Prepaid Smartphone
product_meta.description: Style:Device OnlyThe TracFone LG Treasure LTE Android prepaid smartphone serves as a useful alternative to people who don't want to commit to a month-to-month cell service plan. With this item, you can pay as-you-go. This allows you to track the amount of money you're spending easily. This prepaid smartphone comes fully loaded with a wide variety of applications, including Wi-Fi, GPS and Bluetooth. With it, you can access over a million other apps on Google play. It comes with a camera, so you can snap shots and share them with friends. Use the MP3 player to listen to your favorite music. This Android smartphone supports a microSD memory card of up to 32GB. It should be noted that the memory card does not come included in the packaging and can be bought separately. This LG smartphone comes with up to seven hours of talk time.
feature_bullets: 5 Megapixel Camera/5 Megapixel front facing Camera/video Recorder
